did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: New York State College of Forestry pamphlets 1898-1933

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State College of Forestry

did.physdesc: Printed and typed reports and publications.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Pamphlets produced by the New York State College of Forestry.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: A collection of pamphlets and selected student reports on forestry and lumbering prepared by the New York State College of Forestry at Cornell University, Bernhard E. Fernow, and others pertaining to the College's operation, its experimental forest in the Adirondacks, and the Swenson Suit which resulted in the abandonment of the College's experimental program.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Forestry.
New York State College of Agriculture. Dept. of Forestry.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: New York State College of Forestry Pamphlets, #20-1-401. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
